Package sx.blah.discord.json.requests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountInfoChangeRequest
    This is sent when the account changes its info
    ChannelCreateRequest
    Represents a request to create a new channel.
    ChannelEditRequest
    This is the request sent in order to edit a channel's information.
    ConnectRequest
    This is used to request a connection to the discord websocket
    CreateGuildRequest
    This is sent to create a new guild.
    EditGuildRequest
    This is sent to request that a guild be edited.
    GuildMembersRequest
    Used to request the offline guild members if a guild is "large"
    GuildMembersRequest.RequestObject  
    InviteRequest
    The request sent to request an invite for a channel.
    KeepAliveRequest
    This is sent to request that the connection between the client and the Discord Servers stay alive.
    LoginRequest
    Object sent to login as a user
    MemberEditRequest
    This request is sent to modify a user's roles.
    MessageRequest
    This request is sent to send a message
    PresenceUpdateRequest
    This request is sent when the user updates his/her presence
    PrivateChannelRequest
    This is used to request a private channel be created with a user
    ResumeRequest
    This request is sent to resume a connection after being redirected.
    RoleEditRequest
    This is sent in order to edit a role.
    TransferOwnershipRequest
    This request is sent to transfer the ownership of a guild.
